name: Global Wheat Supply Disruption
description: A scenario where a major geopolitical conflict disrupts global grain shipments, causing a massive price spike for imported flour affecting Singapore.

timed_events.name: Global Grain Export Ban
timed_events.description: A major grain-exporting region announces an export ban to protect its domestic supply, causing global flour prices to skyrocket.

timed_events.name: Singapore Carbon Tax Increase
timed_events.description: The planned national carbon tax increases, impacting operational costs based on total emissions.

effects.message: The increased carbon tax is now in effect.
